A ConnectionLocator for database connections.

A table-to-entity mapper.

Deletes an entity from the mapped table using a write connection.

delete(object $entity) : bool

Parameters

$entity

object

The entity to delete.

Returns

boolTrue if the delete succeeded, false if not. (This is determined by checking the number of rows affected by the query.)

Given a Select, fetches all rows.

The column to use for matching.

The value(s) to match against; this can be an array of values.

Returns a new Select object for the mapped table using a read connection.

newSelect(array $cols) : \Aura\Sql\Query\Select

Parameters

$cols

array

Select these columns from the table; when empty, selects all mapped columns.

Returns

\Aura\Sql\Query\Select

Updates an entity in the mapped table using a write connection; if an array of initial data is present, updates only changed values.

update(object $entity, array $initial_data) : bool

Parameters

$entity

object

The entity to update.

$initial_data

array

Initial data for the entity.

Returns

boolTrue if the update succeeded, false if not. (This is determined by checking the number of rows affected by the query.)
